parameters: While player is hidden, screen is tinted,
and "player hiding" switch #001 is turned on
You hear a familiar voice on the other end...
"You're not who I thought you were, but it turns out
Little Red suits you just fine, doesn't it?"
"You've seen what we see. Go to the Cathedral. They’re
scrambling to catch you and won’t have thought to scrap
"Turn off the lights. Let them all see."
Player has left hiding spot by pressing interact,
screen tints back to normal, and "player hiding"

screen tints back to normal, and "player hiding"
causes animation where enemy is afraid of dark
when light switch 1 is on, plugin script checks if this
event is on either side of the light. Coordinates of either
side of the lights are inside the [] brackets. Coordinates
must be changed for each light.
detects player in front of enemy
